name: System Resource Monitoring
description:
Monitor system resources during peak load

**Resultado Esperado:**
CPU <80% avg, Memory <85%, DB connections <80% pool, API response p95 <2 seconds

**Datos de Prueba:**
Multiple concurrent large uploads
